attributes.action: Remove the use of loud speakers on CCTV cameras.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of loudspeakers on CCTV although it can reduce anti-social behaviour must be stopped and protection put in place as it is and will lead to more serious breaches of human rights i.e: Imposing on law abiding peoples daily lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
